subtitles: 263597 265266 That's all right. I can help you.

266392 268352 I am a doctor.
Now, you must listen to me.

268436 271063 You have lost your memory.
There was an experiment.

271147 272982 Something went wrong.
Your memory was erased.

274108 276152 No, I don't understand.
What the hell is going on here?

276235 278737 Just listen. There are people
coming for you even as we speak.

278821 281740 You must not let them find you.
You must leave now.
346889 349725 Said you left your wallet there.

349808 353020 I suggest you retrieve it since
you only paid for 3 weeks...
353103 354980 and they was up 10 minutes ago.

358692 361028 It's right there in
black and white, Mr. Murdoch.

364156 367576 We make our books like we make
our beds, all neat and tidy.
367660 369453 I'll take care of it when I get back.

369537 371664 See that you do. Only thing
makes you a guest...

371747 374041 in this joint, pal,
is cash on the barrelhead.
400651 403404 No days off for good behaviour.
425384 428971 Mr. Murdoch, yes, where is he?
429054 432766 He... he just left not 5 minutes ago.

468344 472473 ♪ When we dance
you have a way with me ♪

480105 482149 He said he was your
husband's doctor.
482232 483692 He wanted to speak with you.

514223 517309 Thank you for coming to see me
on such short notice.

521814 525818 A rather crude experiment...
designed to further my studies.

527111 532157 You say you're my husband's doctor,
but he never mentioned you to me.

533617 536036 John has been coming to
see me for quite some time.

536120 539790 He had been grappling
with feelings of betrayal...

543043 545212 - John told you what happened?
- Yes.

546296 548549 When was the last time
that you saw him?

550134 553846 He packed a suitcase.
He was very angry at me.

553929 556890 I understand how difficult
this must be for you.

556974 558559 But for John's sake,
I would like you...

558642 561228 to think of me
as your friend, Emma.

561311 565023 It appears that John has suffered
a psychotic break.

574700 577828 if he were to contact you,
and I suspect he will...

577911 580748 you must call me immediately.
Do you understand?

580831 585127 It is imperative that I be
the first one to reach him.

585210 588547 Wherever your husband is,
he is searching...
604480 607191 It is Mr. Murdoch, isn't it?

674550 677678 I told the guy,
"Cash on the barrelhead."
710168 711628 Am I glad you're here, sir.

711712 714298 They say Detective Walenski's
got the heebie-jeebies.

714381 716675 Just take what they give me,
Husselbeck.

723932 727853 Wow. Looks like somebody
woke up on the wrong side of the bed.
773482 774816 You left your wallet here, buddy.
774900 776151 When... when, when did I do that?

777402 780489 - When... when was that?
- When you left your wallet.

813021 815732 Haven't you mugs got
anything better to do?

815816 818026 Well, I'm just trying
to do my job, May.

818110 820153 There's a killer out there
in case you hadn't noticed.

820237 822948 Maybe you should be out looking for him
instead of cooling your heels.
826455 827961 Go on, get out of here.

850434 853520 What's that make so far, Husselbeck?
6 hookers in all?
855105 857566 Give the man an "A" for effort.

857649 859860 You'd think these stiffs
would have the good grace...
859943 862070 to expire at a good time of night.

879796 886094 what kind of killer do you think
stops to save a dying fish?

889389 892601 This killer's been running circles
around us thanks to Walenski.

894519 897439 I've known Eddie a long time.
He's a good cop.

897522 901693 Whatever kind of cop Walenski once was,
he let drift a long time ago.
921421 922714 Let me go, let me go!
922798 924257 I'm not gonna hurt you. I'm not...
935936 939064 I'm being punished for my sins, right?
939147 941483 What did I ever do to inherit this?

942692 947656 Well, everything Detective Walenski
committed to paper should be here, so...

947739 951243 The only thing that should
be committed is Walenski.
952828 955163 Nothing like a little healthy paranoia.

958708 961837 Sir, we just got
the fingerprint results in.
965215 966967 What is this, some kind of joke?

982107 984818 I came here to file a missing
persons report for my husband.
985610 987445 Take it to the front desk.
987529 989364 They told me to come see you.

994369 997372 Mrs. Murdoch,
why didn't you report this before?

997455 1002586 I mean, if your husband has been missing
as long as you say...

1002669 1005380 I thought he'd simply
walked out on me.

1006548 1010468 Then a... doctor contacted me
this evening.
1010552 1012137 How long have you been married?

1016516 1019561 Because you seem uncomfortable
with your ring.

1019644 1023273 As if you were...
unaccustomed to wearing it.
1023356 1024816 No, I never take it off.

1031364 1035410 Do these names
mean anything to you?

1043543 1045253 Why are you looking
for my husband?

1045962 1047756 Are you going to accuse him
of something?

1057307 1059434 Mrs. Murdoch,
I am sorry, I'm sorry.
1059517 1060560 I didn't mean to alarm you.

1060644 1063146 I'm so sorry that I came.
Just both made a mistake.

1064731 1067192 If you'll just give me
half a second to explain...

1098014 1101601 If we did...
I hope you're still breathing.

1106398 1108858 Ha ha. Well,
that's an appropriate name.

1130463 1132173 I mean, how do you know
I'm not the killer?

1132257 1135427 You don't seem like
the killer type. Why?

1136636 1139139 You feeling any urges
I should know about?

1220970 1224682 So it seems you've discovered
your unpleasant nature.

1228937 1232565 We might ask
the same question, yes?

1316024 1319277 What is to be done?
This man is dangerous.
1319360 1321237 It is said he is able to tune.

1322739 1325492 We have seen it
with our own eyes.

1325575 1327952 On occasion the imprinting
does not take.

1331039 1334626 We find them wandering
like lost children.
1334709 1336836 But this one was different, yes?

1336920 1338546 What has the doctor
to say about this?
1338630 1340590 He has failed to report in.

1340673 1343760 - And Mr. Quick?
- No more Mr. Quick.
1356731 1358566 Should we not know, Mr. Hand?

1359526 1362362 We had hoped to learn more
before sharing with you.

1362445 1365365 We can know nothing
until we possess him.
1366449 1368952 Mr. Night, you will take the East.

1394394 1399399 Do you really think my husband could be
capable of committing those murders?

1403069 1406531 Let's hope, for both our sakes,
that I'm wrong.
1450241 1452410 I've been so worried about you.

1457915 1460501 You know, if disappearing
is your way of punishing me...

1461711 1463755 I don't know what
you're talking about.
1466591 1469052 I found these keys in my pocket...
1469135 1471804 so I assume I live here.
1471888 1473598 You supposed to be my wife?
1480104 1483274 don't know who I am, do you?

1484609 1486027 He was worried
that this might happen.

1501709 1503753 I feel like I'm living out
someone else's nightmare.

1503836 1506631 What happened to me?
Why was I seeing a doctor?
1515431 1517225 The police are looking for you.
1517308 1519560 I know. I saw the papers.
1525733 1529278 I was with one of those women...
1533533 1534992 I... I met her outside an Automat.
1536494 1539038 I guess I wanted to test myself.

1539122 1543000 I wanted to know if I had it in me
to do those things.

1543084 1547672 Maybe I have lost my mind, but whoever
I am, I'm still me and I'm not a killer.

1563312 1566065 The car outside,
the one you arrived in.

1566149 1568443 It's a cop.
He dropped me off here.
1570611 1573197 I didn't know he was still here.
1579746 1581664 Wait. You have the wrong man.

1584542 1587670 Right now what you are
is a suspect. Turn yourself in.

1588588 1590131 I'll listen to whatever
you have to say.

1590214 1592091 You're not gonna believe
what I have to say.

1596512 1599599 There's this... this group of men.
They want me dead.

1599682 1602310 And I don't even know if...
They're not even...

1603060 1605271 Yeah, who's gonna
listen to a madman?
1612153 1614906 No one ever listens to me.

1669460 1672713 Hey, you happen to know
the way to Shell Beach?

1672797 1675675 You're kidding. Me and the missus
spent our honeymoon there.

1675758 1678469 All you gotta do is take
Main Street west to...

1683057 1686644 You know, that's funny.
I... I can't seem to remember...

1686727 1689021 if it's Main Street west
or the cross-town.

1693693 1697196 I'm sorry, Inspector,
I cannot be of more assistance...

1697280 1699073 but I am running late
for an appointment.

1699156 1701367 Well, I appreciate
your taking the time.

1709667 1711919 There's just one thing
that puzzles me.

1712003 1716632 I've met quite a few murderers
in the course of my work.
1716716 1719343 Murdoch doesn't strike me as one.

1719427 1723055 Perhaps you are not
accustomed to digging deep enough.

1723139 1725600 Well, I do know when someone
is lying to me, Doctor.

1725683 1728269 Forgive me, Inspector,
but you are not a clinician.

1728352 1732064 Judging personalities
happens to be my business.

1732148 1734108 Well, maybe you could
give me a few pointers.
1738154 1741449 You are a fastidious man, driven.
1744368 1746287 I would say your life is...

1749373 1751959 Good evening, Inspector.
I really must be going.

1793334 1797672 Closing time.
The pool is now closed.

1807223 1811852 Most unfortunate it is that we were
forced to seek you out here.

1812770 1815439 You know how uncomfortable
we find all this...

1817858 1820987 - I'm sorry. I...
- Failed to report in, yes.

1821070 1823656 I was frightened.
I... I have a weak heart, you know.

1823739 1827535 Your weakness is not, we think,
an affair of the heart.

1827618 1830246 We found this
in his hotel room.

1830329 1834208 Must we reproduce
Mr. Murdoch's memories again?

1835418 1837503 but he woke up, he knocked the syringe
right out of my hand.
1837586 1839630 I tried to stop him but he was too fast.

1840923 1844218 Only fragments.
The procedure, it was interrupted.

1844301 1848055 I... I guess it's only a matter
of rounding him up.

1849765 1853394 This is no stray, Doctor.
This one can tune.

1853811 1856564 But that's impossible.
I thought only you had that ability.

1856647 1860901 You will process another template
of the subject's memories, yes?
1860985 1862695 Of course. I'll imprint him again.

1862778 1867283 No. We require them
for a quite different purpose.

1870619 1873039 We'll talk again
after tonight's tuning, but...

1891390 1894894 Perhaps some exercise
would do you good.

1940481 1943818 I've been looking through
some of your old reports.

1947071 1951867 The kind that can make
a man's career...
1953202 1955496 Yeah, I was on that case.

1955579 1959792 And then what?
What happened then, Eddie?

1961752 1965840 I've just been spending time
on the subway, riding in circles.

1971595 1973472 I've been over every inch
of this city.

1978227 1980521 You're scaring your wife
to death, Eddie.

1983816 1986735 I don't know who she is.
I don't know who any of us are.

1988779 1990865 Do you think about
the past much, Frank?
1992324 1993784 As much as the next guy.

1994410 1997496 See, I've been trying
to remember things...

2000291 2005713 But the more I try to think back,
the more it all starts to unravel.

2007131 2010467 It's like I've just been
dreaming this life...

2010551 2014054 and when I finally wake up
I'll be somebody else.
2023480 2026483 Something to do with the case.

2027067 2030487 There is no case.
There never was!

2030571 2034992 It's all just a big joke!
It's a joke!
2100766 2103936 The recollections of a great lover?

2109942 2114530 You wouldn't appreciate that,
would you, Mr. Whatever your name is?

2114613 2118993 Not the sort of conquests
you would ever understand.
2138137 2140347 a tragic death in the family.
2153944 2155779 during the tuning as the others do?

2155863 2159950 I don't know. Maybe he's a step up
the evolutionary ladder.

2160034 2162870 A... A freak of nature.
He's adapting to survive.

2162953 2166290 What do you expect?
Weren't you looking for the human soul?

2166373 2168876 That's the purpose
of your little zoo, isn't it?

2168959 2172254 That's why you keep changing people
and things around every night.

2172338 2175382 Maybe you have finally found
what you are looking for...

2175466 2176633 and it's going
to bite you on your...

2180637 2184224 It requires several of your lifetimes
to master our gifts.

2184308 2188145 The idea that a simple man
could develop the ability to tune...
2278777 2280028 You think you've got it tough?

2280112 2281989 You try looking after these kids,
for a change.

2282906 2287035 Anyways, Frederickson says
he'll take me off the damn night shift soon.

2602934 2606563 Probably have maid's quarters
before the night is through.

2664621 2666748 That's no way to greet
a patient, Doctor.
2666832 2668542 If that's what you are... Doctor?

2670085 2671878 What is happening here?
Why is everyone asleep?
2671962 2674297 Shh. Please keep your voice down.

2674381 2676258 Why can't I remember anything?
What have you done to me?

2676341 2679052 Nothing, nothing.
Please, I want to help you.

2680470 2682639 It is not safe.
If they see us together, they'll...

2682722 2684099 I don't care.
I want some answers.
2686768 2688645 Why are they trying to kill me?
2695151 2698238 My God. You really can do it.

2699656 2701867 Listen to me, John.
You have their power.

2701950 2703994 You can make things happen
by will alone.

2704077 2707330 They call it tuning. That is how they make
the buildings change.

2707414 2709916 Just now you acted out
of self-defense. A reflex.

2710000 2712794 But I can teach you to control
your power consciously.

2712878 2715171 Let me help you, John.
Together we can stop them.
2715255 2716840 We can take the city back.

2772395 2775023 He made a terrible
impression for the firm...

2777484 2780320 So I simply told Frederickson
I was going to have to let him go.
2780403 2783114 And well you should have, darling.
2785784 2787035 I don't know where he has gone.

2829786 2835583 ♪ But if you put me down
for another ♪
2877042 2882714 ♪ When you tell those little white lies ♪

2907363 2910825 Tonight's experiment shall be conducted
in the following locations.

2910909 2915288 The first subject
shall be imprinted here on Avenue M.
2915371 2917832 Mr. Book. There is a... a problem.

2917916 2921211 There is no Avenue M.
We were unable to complete it.

2921294 2924964 During the last tuning
we detected a lack of control.

2927759 2932472 Then this man Murdoch
is more powerful than we thought.
2934349 2938853 So we must become like him.

2938937 2941314 The good doctor
has done as we asked?

2941397 2944692 The life and times
of John Murdoch, Volume 2.

2949405 2952909 Murdoch does not possess
these memories, yes?

2952992 2955620 How will his imprint
allow us to find him?

2958081 2960667 everyone he seeks out
will be known to us.

2960750 2965672 And as he follows the clues,
so shall we follow the memories.

2965755 2968383 Perhaps we have forgotten
what happened last time, when we t...

2973555 2980812 If Mr. Hand wishes to make this sacrifice
for the greater good...

2982939 2988069 But to imprint one of us.
Failure has always resulted.

2988153 2991656 What Mr. Hand proposes
is our only option.
3043541 3047086 I have John Murdoch... in mind.

3053801 3057222 "I found this postcard
among your mother's things.

3094676 3097470 Excuse me. Can you tell
me the way to Avenue C?

3108398 3112777 25 years. No days off
for good behaviour.
3176090 3178176 A dead end, yes, Mr. Wall.

3178259 3180803 We thought his imprint would
allow us to track him, yes...

3180887 3183264 but instead we have
been brought here.

3187393 3190772 and we must follow
where they lead, yes.

3190855 3195318 Mr. Sleep suggests he may go
to places familiar... his job.
3195401 3197403 He does not care about our job.

3210166 3213753 how my wife had hurt me
by sleeping with another man.

3218508 3222011 I would look for a way
to hurt her in return.
3240321 3241614 How do I get to the end of the line?

3254293 3255628 - You want platform 2.
- Got it. Thanks a lot.
3256754 3258172 How come that train didn't stop?
3261092 3262969 There's no way out, you know?

3263052 3265972 You can't get out of the city.
Believe me, I've tried.
3269183 3270893 The one they've been looking for.

3270977 3272812 - Who are you?
- Used to be a cop.
3273521 3275982 At least, in this life, I was.

3279026 3280820 Then they swap them around
between us.

3280903 3283531 I've seen them do it.
Back and forth, back and forth...

3283614 3285658 till no one knows
who they are anymore.
3285741 3286993 How do you know all this?

3287076 3291330 Once in a while, one of us wakes up
while they're changing things.

3291414 3293624 It's not supposed to happen,
but it does.
3295751 3297670 They'll come looking for you, Murdoch.
3298796 3300423 Just like they'll come looking for me.
3320026 3322320 This was to be his home.
3325072 3326866 That was when we loved her.
3326949 3328784 This is all well and good, Mr. Hand...

3328868 3333372 But we require a more practical link
to his present whereabouts.
3338544 3340880 And I know where to find her.

3348721 3351599 We're very lucky,
when you think about it.

3352725 3356979 To be able to revisit those places
which have meant so very much to us.

3357813 3359857 I thought it was more
that we were haunted by them.

3368366 3370034 in which your memories
were not your own...

3370117 3373663 but those shared
by every other of your kind.

3374413 3378668 Imagine the torment
of such an existence...
3378751 3381212 no experiences to call your own.
3383839 3386050 If it was all you knew...
3386133 3387843 maybe it would be a comfort.

3388511 3391222 But if you were to discover
something different...

3398938 3401524 There used to be a ferry
when I was a boy.
3403401 3406529 Lit up like a floating birthday cake.

3407780 3409991 That's just what my husband
once said to me...

3415162 3418666 I wish I knew.
What brings you here?
3419458 3422295 I met my wife at this place.
3422378 3424130 It's where I first met my husband.

3544875 3547712 I thought you'd forgotten
your Uncle Karl.
3573404 3575406 Shell Beach is where I grew up?

3579076 3582246 I need to get there, Karl.
How do I get there?

3583998 3587001 - I haven't been there in years.
- Come on. You must remember.

3593424 3596343 The old cracker barrel
ain't what it used to be.

3605561 3607938 You were always scribbling
in that damn book.
3608481 3611066 That's me and your pa. Ha!
3611150 3613319 What a couple of handsome fools.

3624789 3627166 They died when their house
burnt down.

3645392 3647978 You burnt your arm
pretty bad in the fire.

3653526 3656821 - What does it mean, Johnny?
- It means these are all lies!
3660741 3662701 Why are you here, Mrs. Murdoch?

3671836 3674296 My husband told me
he'd been here.

3678133 3680427 He told me he wanted
to test himself...

3695192 3698988 I wanted to talk to her. I thought maybe
she could help me find him.

3700197 3702658 Stay here.
I'm gonna call the station.

3714003 3719133 Yeah, this is Bumstead. Send the
homicide coroner to 1440... East, yeah.

3722261 3725472 It's the same pattern.
I'll explain when you get here.
3737526 3739695 It's OK. I won't hurt you.
3751749 3753667 Where the hell did she come from?
3784907 3787910 Are you ready to go home, Mrs. Murdoch?
3787993 3790621 The inspector is gonna take me. Thanks.
3819400 3822653 It was a gift from my mother.

3825280 3827616 I keep it with me
to remind me of her.

3836542 3838919 I can't remember
when she gave it to me.

3841463 3844466 How do you think I could
forget a thing like that?

3846635 3850806 Do you think about the past much,
Mrs. Murdoch?
3855811 3858480 I'm not sure I know anymore.
3862026 3864570 I left your old room like it was.
3866822 3869074 Glad to have you back, Johnny...
3869158 3870784 even if it is for just a night.

3874288 3878125 Why, sure. That clock's
kept perfect time since I bought it.

3882671 3884590 I don't understand.
How can it be night already?

3884673 3886341 What happened to the day?
How'd I miss it?

3890763 3894349 get some sleep. We'll straighten
all this out tomorrow.

3953200 3955077 Keep him there,
and I'll be right over.
3963085 3964586 We just have to play it as it comes.

3964670 3968173 Johnny, we...
We just wanted to help.

3978433 3982104 Johnny, if you're in some kind of trouble...
well, maybe we could do something.
3983605 3986066 Haven't seen you in so long.

4060641 4066021 Mr. Murdoch... you've been
the cause of much distress.

4070067 4072444 - Start talking.
- There's no need for this.
4073946 4075906 The city's ours. We made it.

4077532 4080661 We fashioned this city
on stolen memories...

4080744 4084539 different eras, different pasts
all rolled into one.
4084623 4087084 Each night, we revise it, refine it...

4096260 4099304 - Why?!
- We need to be like you.
4100264 4102599 I understand you now, Mr. Murdoch.

4102683 4106186 I remember that which you do not...
what you've been missing.
4108981 4111566 running along the waves as a child...

4111650 4116571 meeting Emma at the river...
That first kiss that followed.
4120200 4123120 We use your dead as vessels.
4269307 4271768 What about her? Ring any bells?
4271852 4273145 She was alive when I left her.
4274354 4276314 This is nothing. I... This is...

4276398 4278650 It must mean something,
all those pictures.

4281987 4284781 Stop playing games with me, Murdoch!
Stop telling me lies!
4284865 4286324 I am not telling you lies!

4286408 4288743 Help me out here.
Make me understand.

4288827 4290871 I have this jigsaw puzzle
in front of my face...

4290954 4293915 and every time I try to rearrange
the pieces, it still doesn't make any sense.

4293999 4295333 What... You... You...
think it makes sense to me?
4295417 4297419 I'm as much in the dark here as you are.
4297502 4299671 You let me ask you a question?

4300755 4302132 You heard of a place
called Shell Beach?

4302215 4304676 - Sure.
- You know how to get there?

4306219 4310348 Oh, all right. You just...
You go to the...
4312350 4314436 Just give me a second, will ya?
4320609 4321985 You think that's kind of odd?
4325113 4326448 I got a better one for you.

4327866 4330702 you remember doing
something during the day?
4331912 4334122 I just mean... during the day.

4336291 4337792 When was the last time
you remember seeing it?

4337876 4341588 And I'm not talking about some distant,
half-forgotten childhood memory.

4341671 4344758 I mean like yesterday?
Last week? When?

4344841 4347260 Can you come up
with a single memory?

4350138 4353308 You know something?
I don't think the sun even...

4356144 4360357 'Cause I've been up for hours and hours
and hours and the night never ends here.

4361149 4363735 - That is crazy.
- You're damn right this is crazy.

4363818 4366196 Listen to me, Bumstead.
It's not just me.
4368323 4369824 They're doing something to all of us.

4369908 4372619 - Shut up, you... I've... I've heard enough.
- Please listen.

4372702 4374454 - Shut up, will ya! Shut up!
- Listen to me.

4384673 4387968 There has to be an explanation
for this somewhere.
4421209 4423003 I never meant to hurt you, John...

4423086 4424170 and I did it,
and I don't know why I did.
4424254 4426381 I wish I could take it all back.
4426464 4428967 No. Emma... You didn't do it.

4429050 4431761 This... affair of yours,
whatever it is...

4431845 4433430 the thing you're
supposed to have done...

4433513 4435307 you didn't do it.
I don't believe it ever happened.
4436850 4439144 I know this is gonna sound crazy...

4439227 4442147 but what if we never
knew each other before now?
4442230 4444566 What if the first time we ever met...

4444649 4448445 was last night in your...
in our apartment...

4451489 4454326 and everything that I'm supposed
to remember never really happened?
4454409 4456953 Someone just wants us to think it did.
4462125 4464502 You know, back in the apartment...

4465295 4467756 I suddenly felt like
I didn't know you at all.
4469549 4472052 It was as if you were a stranger.
4474304 4476056 But how can that be true?
4476640 4480727 I so vividly remember meeting you.
4480810 4483855 I remember falling in love with you.
4505502 4508213 You can't fake something like that.

4546626 4550380 I... kind of thought
you should know.

4553007 4555677 Oh, and...
the chief wanted to see you.
4564102 4566104 I knew you'd track the killer down, sir.
4596050 4597135 How can we help you, sir?

4622035 4625622 I wanted to be the first
to congratulate you... about the case.

4664244 4666871 Don't you think it's about time
you started giving me some answers?
4674045 4676047 I... I come here quite often.

4676130 4678550 It's one of the few places
I'm allowed a moment's peace.

4678633 4681970 You... You see,
they have an aversion to... to water.
4683137 4685557 One could almost call it a phobia.

4685640 4688893 Who are they?
What do they want from me?
4690562 4692564 Well, for now, let's just say...

4692647 4695316 that you were the subject
of their experiment.
4701781 4703491 And you are not a murderer.
4705451 4707161 I'm sorry about this. I truly am.
4707245 4708746 But we do not have much time...

4708830 4711416 and I cannot afford the luxury
of doing this the right way.

4713042 4715336 all the answers
are in this syringe.
4715420 4716588 I need you to inject yourself.

4716671 4719007 It's the only way to
make you understand.

4720425 4723386 We're running out of time, John.
You have to do this now.

4725513 4727891 Inspector, he is more
disturbed than we thought.

4727974 4730643 I may not be the judge of personality
that you are, Doctor...

4730727 4733688 but you're the one
who looks disturbed to me.

4734606 4736399 You do not know
what you are doing.
4737609 4741195 What, exactly is in this... Doctor?

4742947 4745116 All the answers you've
been looking for, John.

4747827 4752832 Guess I'll just have to
hold on to it for... safekeeping.

4756878 4762216 - Go? Where are we going?
- Shell Beach.
4763301 4765595 That's where you want to go, isn't it?
4779525 4781110 What do you hope to gain by helping me?

4783529 4786449 None of these maps extend far enough
to show the ocean.

4787951 4789827 I promise you!
I've been there, and...

4789911 4792455 If you've been there,
you can show us the way, then, can't you?

4798419 4801172 I refuse.
You... You can't make me go there!

4827323 4830868 I don't understand.
Used to be a bridge here.

4837625 4839168 Try that again,
your friends are gonna be...
4839252 4840545 fishing you out of the canal.

4840628 4841963 Just don't hurt me.
I'll tell you everything.

4861357 4865903 We will give you some more
pretty things soon... Anna.
4875413 4878291 I have another use for her first.

4885006 4890219 First there was darkness.
Then came the strangers.

4892388 4894682 They abducted us
and brought us here.

4900188 4903024 They mix and match
our memories as they see fit...

4903107 4905860 trying to divine
what makes us unique.

4906569 4909280 One day, a man
might be an inspector.

4912366 4915620 When they want to
study a murderer for instance...

4915703 4919499 they simply imprint one of their citizens
with a new personality...

4920625 4924629 arrange a family for him,
friends, an entire history...

4930176 4934222 Will a man, given the history
of a killer, continue in that vein?

4934305 4938267 Or are we, in fact, more
than the mere sum of our memories?

4938351 4943314 This business of you being a killer
was an unhappy coincidence.

4943397 4946192 You have had dozens
of lives before now.

4946275 4949612 You just happened to wake up
while I was imprinting you with this one.
4950404 4952490 Why are they doing all of this?
4952573 4955910 It is our capacity for individuality...

4955993 4958496 our souls that makes
us different from them.

4958579 4960915 They think they
can find the human soul...

4960998 4964085 if they understand
how our memories work.

4969841 4973219 Their entire race
is on the brink of extinction.
4973302 4975138 They think we can save them.

4975221 4977640 - Where do I fit in?
- You are different, John.

4978266 4981102 You resisted my attempt
to imprint you.

4985773 4989110 Somehow you have developed
their ability to tune.
4989193 4990403 That is how they change things.
4990486 4991988 That is how they built this city.

4992071 4994949 They have machines buried deep
beneath the surface...

4995032 4998953 that allow them
to focus their telepathic energies.

4999829 5002248 They control everything here,
even the sun.

5002331 5005668 That's why it's always dark.
They can't stand the light.
5005751 5006961 So why do they need you?

5007044 5011382 When they first brought us here,
they extracted what was in us.

5011465 5015261 So they could store the information,
remix it like so much paint...

5015344 5017847 and give us back new memories
of their choosing.

5017930 5021559 But they still needed an artist
to help them.

5023394 5026522 I understood the intricacies
of the human mind...

5029150 5031861 so they allowed me
to keep my skills as a scientist...

5033404 5035865 But they made me
delete everything else.

5044248 5047043 Can you imagine what
it is like being forced...

5048878 5052215 What about my past?
What about my childhood?
5058804 5060640 This was blank when I found it!

5062808 5065937 You were never a boy...
not in this place.

5066020 5068773 Your entire history is an illusion,
a fabrication...
5068856 5070691 as it is with all of us.

5070775 5073236 You made those drawings
happen with your gift.
5073319 5075196 You say they brought us here.
5164243 5168331 There is nothing beyond the city.
5222635 5224804 And now you know the truth.

5293414 5296292 You'll allow yourself
to surrender, Mr. Murdoch...

5296375 5298544 or it will result in
this one's death, yes?

5298627 5301130 What do I care?
She's not my real wife!

5302381 5306552 But you do still care,
don't you, Mr. Murdoch?

5306635 5309263 You see, I have
become the monster...

5313142 5317062 Shall I end her life now
as you would have?

5374245 5377122 The doctor was right.
He has evolved.

5392805 5397226 Dangerous. But he can also
lead us to what we seek.
5397309 5400646 What the doctor calls the soul.

5400729 5404400 It is time for our experiment
to move into a final phase.

5404483 5407152 We no longer need
the other subjects.
5407236 5410823 The time for study is over.

5410906 5415119 It is time to be one
with John Murdoch.

5450154 5454700 They want to imprint you
with their own collective memories.

5456035 5460164 They want to make you one of them,
so they can share your soul.
5470549 5473552 The pain will only last a moment.

5487608 5489526 You'll rise to greater
heights than that, my boy.

5489610 5491403 One day when you're older,
you'll understand.

5498494 5501664 Now remember what I told you.
Never talk to strangers.

5503582 5506377 You're probably wondering why I keep
appearing in your memories.

5506460 5508962 It is because I have
inserted myself in them.

5509046 5511090 All of these memories
have been fabricated...
5511173 5512841 to teach you about the strangers.

5512925 5516053 Give you a lifetime of knowledge
in a single syringe.
5532820 5534863 You're getting the hang of it, John.

5534947 5536990 Maybe one day
I'll be working for you.

5537825 5540994 This is the machine the strangers use
to amplify their thoughts.
5542996 5544498 You must take control of it.
5544581 5546166 You must make the machine yours.
5546250 5548335 I know you can beat them, John.
5562850 5565561 There is no time for romance, John.
5565644 5567938 The world can be what you make it.

5570065 5572568 You have the power
to make anything happen...
5859021 5860439 I knew you could do it, John.
5866653 5869406 She is not Emma anymore, John.
5870949 5872576 So give her back her memories.

5872659 5875078 I can't. The facility
where the strangers...
5880375 5883086 What are you going to do now, John?

5884838 5888633 You told me I had
the power, didn't you?

5889009 5891511 I can make these machines
do anything I want.

5893180 5895515 Make this world anything
I want it to be.

5896516 5899561 Just so long as I concentrate
hard enough.

6093421 6096758 I'm just making a few little changes
around here, is all.
6096841 6098551 Are we sure that's what we want?
6099052 6101471 I'm prepared to take my chances.

6103056 6106059 Your imprint is not
agreeable with my kind.

6107519 6109771 But I wanted to know
what it was like...

6112691 6115318 You know how I was
supposed to feel.

6119239 6122951 You wanted to know what it was
about us that made us human.

6124327 6127664 Well, you're not going
to find it... in here.

6129416 6132043 You went looking
in the wrong place.

6245031 6247826 Do you know if Shell Beach
is around here?
6247909 6250537 I think that's it just over there.
6272725 6274727 Would you like to join me?
6589834 6594130 ♪ Like a lazy ocean hugs the shore ♪

6608895 6613149 ♪ When we dance
you have a way with me ♪
6618154 6622867 ♪ Other dancers may be on the floor ♪
6622950 6627622 ♪ Dear, but my eyes will see only you ♪
6637089 6641010 ♪ I can hear the sound of violins ♪

6646432 6650520 ♪ Make me thrill
as only you know how ♪
